Uses of Class
org.threeten.extra.scale.UTCRules

  • Packages that use UTCRules 
    Package Description
    org.threeten.extra.scale  

    • Uses of UTCRules in org.threeten.extra.scale

      Methods in org.threeten.extra.scale that return UTCRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UTCRules UTCInstant.getRules()
      Gets the leap second rules defining when leap seconds occur.
      static UTCRules UTCRules.system()
      Gets the system default leap second rules.
      Methods in org.threeten.extra.scale with parameters of type UTCRules 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UTCInstant UTCInstant.of(java.time.Instant instant, UTCRules rules)
      Obtains an instance of UTCInstant from a provider of instants using the specified leap second rules.
      static UTCInstant UTCInstant.of(TAIInstant taiInstant, UTCRules rules)
      Obtains an instance of UTCInstant from a TAI instant using the specified leap second rules.
      static UTCInstant UTCInstant.ofModifiedJulianDay(long mjDay, long nanoOfDay, UTCRules rules)
      Obtains an instance of UTCInstant from a Modified Julian Day with a nanosecond fraction of second using the specified leap second rules.
